gotn.message: %s, next episode of Glory of The Night airs in %s.

mlp.message: %s, next episode of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, **%s**, airs in %s on the **%s** channel.
mlp.error: %s, I don't know when the next episode of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic airs.

time.message: %s, current date and time is **%s** at **%s**. The unix timestamp is: `%s`.

np.message:
%s, the track currently playing on PonyvilleFM is:
*%s*
np.error: %s, I am unable to tell you which track is currently playing on PonyvilleFM.

lyrics.message: %s, here are the lyrics of that track:
lyrics.radio: %s, here are the lyrics of the track currently playing on PonyvilleFM:
lyrics.listA: %s, check your direct messages, I am sending you the full list there!
lyrics.listB: Here are all the tracks I know the lyrics of:
lyrics.errorA: %s, I don't know the lyrics of that track.
lyrics.errorB: %s, I don't know the lyrics of the track currently playing on PonyvilleFM.

artwork.message: Here is the artwork for that track:
artwork.radio: Here is the artwork for the track currently playing on PonyvilleFM:
artwork.listA: %s, check your direct messages, I am sending you the full list there!
artwork.listB: Here are all the tracks I have an artwork for:
artwork.errorA: %s, I don't have an artwork for that track.
artwork.errorB: %s, I don't have an artwork for the track currently playing on PonyvilleFM.

phase.messageA: %s, the Moon is currently in its %s phase. The next phase is the %s, and it happens in %s.
phase.error: %s, I'm sorry, but I can't tell you anything about the Moon phases at the moment...

moon.messageB: Here is how the Moon looks like right now.

room.message:
%s, here is the status of Thorinair's room. Last update was %s and %s seconds ago.
```
Temperature:   %s °C
Humidity:      %s %
Pressure:      %s hPa
Magnitude:     %s uT
Inclination:   %s °
Geiger Counts: %s CPM
Dose Rate:     %s uSv/h```
room.error: %s, I am having trouble connecting to VariPass. Please try again later...

power.messageA: %s, my mains power seems to be running as expected. Last update was %s and %s seconds ago.
power.messageB:
**%s, I have detected that my mains power is not running! Somepony please poke Thorinair!** Last update was %s and %s seconds ago.
%s
power.error: %s, I haven't received any mains power status information yet since last reboot.

eeg.messageA: %s, below is a readout of Thorinair's brainwave data along with relevant EEG info. Last update was %s and %s seconds ago.
eeg.messageB:
```
Battery:    %s %
Signal:     %s %
Attention:  %s %
Meditation: %s %
Delta:      %s
Theta:      %s
Low Alpha:  %s
High Alpha: %s
Low Beta:   %s
High Beta:  %s
Low Gamma:  %s
High Gamma: %s```
eeg.error: %s, I haven't received any EEG data yet since last reboot.

printer.messageB: Nightmare Rarity is currently not printing anything. You can view the printing area on the webcam image below.
printer.messageC: Nightmare Rarity is currently printing a file called `%s`, and the print is %s% done. It is estimated that the printing time will take around %s more. You can view the printing area on the webcam image below.
printer.error: It looks like Nightmare Rarity is currently offline. Please try again later...

token.message: The current price of the [WoW Token] is %s. Last update was %s ago.
token.error: I was unable to look up information about the [WoW Token] price...

blacklist.messageA: %s, I am sad to hear that you no longer wish me to remember your messages. From this point on, I will not remember anything you say in any channel. If you ever change your mind, just use this command again.
blacklist.messageB: %s, I am happy to hear that I may remember your messages again! From this point on, I will again remember everything you say in any channel where learning is enabled.

stats.message:
%s, my current version is v%s. Last time I've been rebooted was %s at %s, which was %s and %s seconds ago.
Internally, this chatroom is defined as `%s` and the brain I am using here is called `%s`. The brain has **%s** lines of data saved from messages. %s
stats.learnyes: I am able to normally learn everything from this specific chatroom.
stats.learnno: I am unable to learn anything from this specific chatroom.

about.message: Hey, %s! I'm happy to meet you! My name is Princess Luna, and my creator is Thorinair. I help around with his Glory of The Night radio show, but I also have quite a lot of fun commands that you can play around with. You can also talk to me by @ mentioning me! Just use my !help command to learn more. Oh, and my source code is available here: %s. Hope you have a lovely night!

help.message: %s, check your direct messages, I've sent you the information there!
help.messageA: Here are some of the commands you can use:
help.messageD: • I can also interract with others. Use any of the following commands and mention somepony or multiple of them afterwards: %s.
help.messageE: • You can also talk with me by mentioning me in the chat.

kiss.self: *Opens two magical portals and uses them to give herself a kiss on the cheek.*

boop.self: *Boops her own snout and makes a confused face.*

glomp.multiple: *Jumps at the pony pile made out of %s and glomps all of them.*
glomp.self: *Jumps upwards in the air, falls down and awkwardly glomps herself.*

snuggle.self: *Wraps hooves around herself and lonely snuggles herself.*

nuzzle.multiple: *Gathers up %s before happily nuzzling all of them.*
nuzzle.self: *Bends her head downwards in confusion and fails to nuzzle herself.*

wings.single: *Wraps wings around %s in a warm embrace.*
wings.multiple: *Wraps wings around %s, keeping all of them warm.*
wings.self: *Wraps wings around herself in a tight fluffy ball.*

snack.single: *Throws a snack at %s and flies away.*
snack.self: *Throws a snack at herself and looks at you in confusion.*

floof.multiple: *Rounds up %s before smothering them with her soft floof.*
floof.self: *Pushes her own head into her soft floof awkwardly.*

nom.self: *Looks around and noms her own hoof.*

preen.single: *Gently preens %s's wings fixing up all the feathers.*
preen.self: *Checks if there is nopony looking and starts preening her wings.*

blep.single: *Bleps at %s and makes a goofy giggle.*
blep.multiple: *Looks at %s before her and then bleps at all of them.*
blep.self: *Randomly bleps for no reason at all.*

pet.single: *Affectionately brushes up against %s as they pet her head.*
pet.multiple: *Rolls over on her back, enjoying the attention as %s pet her tummy.*
pet.self: *Pets her own head with her hoof while staring blankly in the distance.*

plushie.single: *Casts a spell at %s, turning them into a plushie.*
plushie.multiple: *Casts spells at %s, turning everypony into plushies.*
plushie.self: *Casts a spell at herself, turning herself into a plushie before remaining motionless.*
plushie.error:
Somepony turned me into a plushie so I can't move or do anything... :(
Please turn me back first using the `!unplushie` command... *sigh*

unplushie.single: *Casts a spell at %s, returning them back to normal.*
unplushie.multiple: *Casts spells at %s, returning everypony back to themselves.*
unplushie.self: *Casts a spell at herself, turning herself back to normal.* Thank you, %s!
unplushie.error: *Looks at herself and then at you in confusion.* What...? I am not a plushie...

nptoggle.messageA: %s, I will now be posting new track names as they appear to this chat.
nptoggle.messageB: %s, I will no longer be posting new track names.

send.message: Thori, I'm sending the message now...
send.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the channel for me to send to.
send.errorB: Thori, you need to specify the text for me to send.

learn.message: Thori, I've learned the text you gave me.
learn.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the brain which I should learn with after the command.
learn.errorB: Thori, I don't have a brain with that name.
learn.errorC: Thori, you need to specify the text to learn as well.

purge.messageA: Thori, purging the given data will remove `%s` messages from the brain `%s`. This will drop the brain's line count from `%s` to `%s`. If you wish to proceed, write `!purge yes`, otherwise, `!purge no`
purge.messageB: Thori, I've purged the memory from that brain. The brain now has `%s` lines of data. I will now perform a reboot to refresh my memory. Be right back!
purge.messageC: Thori, I've cancelled the purging procedure.
purge.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the brain which I should purge from after the command.
purge.errorB: Thori, I don't have a brain with that name.
purge.errorC: Thori, you need to specify start and end messages below the command.
purge.errorD: Thori, I don't remember that starting message, please try again.
purge.errorE: Thori, I don't remember that ending message, please try again.
purge.errorF: Thori, a purge is already prepared, please write `!purge yes` or `!purge no`.
purge.errorG: Thori, there was an error while purging the brain.

npoverride.message:
Thori, I'm overriding the Now Playing info with the new track!
It is now: **%s**
npoverride.error: Thori, you need to specify the track name.

npstatus.messageA: Thori, here are all the channels where I am currently posting the Now Playing announcements:
npstatus.error: Thori, I am currently not posting the Now Playing announcements to any channel.

nppurge.message: Thori, I have purged all of the Now Playing announcement channels.
nppurge.notify: Thorinair told me that I should stop automatically telling you the Now Playing info for now, sorry! You can use the command again if you wish to resume.
nppurge.error: Thori, I have no channels to purge.

lyricsadd.message: Thori, I've added lyrics for the track "%s".
lyricsadd.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the track name.
lyricsadd.errorB: Thori, you need to specify the lyrics as well.

lyricsdel.message: Thori, I've removed lyrics for the track "%s".
lyricsdel.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the track name.
lyricsdel.errorB: Thori, I don't know of any track with that name.

artworkadd.messageA: Thori, I've added artwork for the track "%s".
artworkadd.messageB: Thori, I've replaced artwork for the track "%s".
artworkadd.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the track name.
artworkadd.errorB: Thori, you need to specify the artwork URL as well.

artworkdel.message: Thori, I've removed artwork for the track "%s".
artworkdel.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the track name.
artworkdel.errorB: Thori, I don't know of any track with that name.

h.messageA: Thori, here are all the channels where I am tracking an h chain, along with the last seen h:
h.error: Thori, I am not yet tracking any h chain.

ignore.error: Thori, you need to specify the user ID after the command.
ignore.messageA: Thori, I am adding this user to the ignore list. I will no longer learn anything they say.
ignore.messageB: Thori, I am removing this user from the ignore list. I will once again be able to learn from them.

mood.messageA: Thori, the moods I can currently set the lighting to are:
mood.messageC: Thori, I am setting the mood to **%s**!
mood.error: Thori, I don't know of any mood with that name.

bulb.messageA: Thori, the bulbs I currently have access to are:
bulb.messageC: Thori, I am setting the parameters now!
bulb.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the parameters. The parameters should be written as shown below:
bulb.errorC:
or
```Color X (0.0-1.0)
Color Y (0.0-1.0)
Brightness (0.0-1.0)
Transition Time (in seconds)```
bulb.errorD: Thori, I don't know of any bulb with that name.

toggle.messageA: Thori, the bulbs I currently have access to are:
toggle.messageC: Thori, I am toggling the bulb now!
toggle.error: Thori, I don't know of any bulb with that name.

schedulestart.messageA: Thori, I have scheduled automatic bulb control for the next %s days. Here are all of the times I have scheduled:
schedulestart.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the number of days after the command.
schedulestart.errorB: Thori, there is already a schedule running. Please stop is first using the `!schedulestop`.

schedulestop.message: Thori, am disabling the running scheduled automatic bulb control.
schedulestop.error: Thori, there is no scheduled automatic bulb control running.

eegstart.message: Thori, EEG recording of your brain has been started!
eegstart.error: Thori, there is already an EEG recording in place. Please stop is first using the `!eegstop`.

eegstop.messageA: Thori, The EEG recording has been stopped. Processing the data now...
eegstop.messageB: You may download the EEG data in the CSV tables below.
eegstop.errorA: Thori, there is no EEG recording in place.
eegstop.errorB: I haven't recorded any EEG data in this period.

leave.messageA: Thori, here is a list of all the servers which I am a member of. Use the ID when leaving:
leave.messageC: Thori, I have left the server *%s*!
leave.error: Thori, I am not a part of any server with that ID.

reboot.message: I'm just going to go quickly reboot myself. Be right back, Thori!

reload.message: Thori, I have reloaded my configuration.

backup.messageA: Thori, I've started a backup of my files. Give me a moment...
backup.messageB: Here, I am sending you the newest backup of all of my files.
backup.error: Looks like something has gone wrong, but I am not sure what... Here is more info: %s

system.errorA: Thori, you need to specify the system command you wish to run.
system.errorB: Thori, I don't know of such a command.
system.errorC: Thori, I was unable to perform the system command. Here is more info: %s
system.mreboot: I'm going to perform a full system reboot. This might take a bit longer. See you in a bit, Thori!

gotn.long: @everyone, a new episode of Glory of The Night starts in %s! Don't forget to tune in to PonyvilleFM! <https://ponyvillefm.com>
gotn.shortA:
Everypony @here, Glory of The Night begins in only %s! Tune in to PonyvilleFM now! I suggest using the Vorbis HQ (OGG) stream for best sound quality. https://ponyvillefm.com/player
Also, come watch Thorinair's live video stream here: <http://luna.thorinair.net/?action=stream>
gotn.shortB: Thorinair's Glory of The Night begins in only %s! Tune in to PonyvilleFM now so you don't miss out!
gotn.nowA: **Everypony @here, Glory of The Night is now live! Tune in to PonyvilleFM using the link above!**
gotn.nowB: **Thorinair's Glory of The Night has begun! %s, join us in the beautiful night!**
gotn.afterA: Everypony @here, the show is over for tonight. Thank you all who joined in! You can relisten to the show as soon as Thorinair uploads it to his Mixcloud.
gotn.afterB: The show is over for tonight. Thank you all who joined in! You can relisten to the show as soon as Thorinair uploads it to his Mixcloud.

phases.full: Everypony @here, the Moon has reached its %s phase! Let the moonlight shine upon you in all its might!
phases.else: The Moon has reached its %s phase...

power.off1: **@everyone, I need to urgently inform you that my mains power has gone out! Please come save me! I am currently running off the UPS...**
power.off2: **@everyone, I am starting to panic here! The power is still out...**
power.off3: **@everyone, I am warning you for the last time!!! I WILL go to sleep if you don't restore the power!!!**
power.on: Phew... @everyone, I am happy to inform you that the mains power has been restored!

seizure.debug:
Thori, my brain has entered a seizure... I am going to reboot myself. The offending message was the following:
```#%s: %s```
seizure.reply:
%s, I don't feel so good... I don't know what's happening... I don't wanna go...
*[Brain seizure detected, performing an emergency reboot!]*
seizure.return: Okay, I think I feel a little bit better now...

announcements.motion: **@everyone, WARNING: Tantabus has detected motion on the camera "%s"! I am sending you the image now... Please check what's up!**
announcements.boot: Thori, I have detected that the device **%s** has booted up.
announcements.schedule:
As scheduled, I am toggling the following bulbs to **%s**: *%s*
Motion detection may trigger!
announcements.npreboot: I need to go for a reboot... I'm sorry if I miss any tracks!
announcements.npback: Hey, I'm back! Now back to track posting...

misc.welcome: **My children, welcome %s to our beautiful night!**
misc.load: Hey Thori, I'm back! My current version is v%s.
misc.filefail: Hey Thori, I'm back! My current version is v%s. I was having some trouble connecting to the US Navy API. If you reboot me, I will try again. I also don't seem to have a backup file to load from either.
misc.apifail: Hey Thori, I'm back! My current version is v%s. I was having some trouble connecting to the US Navy API. If you reboot me, I will try again. I've loaded the data from the backup file for now.
misc.timezone: %s, I don't know of that timezone. Here are all the timezones I know of: <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones>
misc.noperm: I am sorry %s, but I am not allowed to do that for you here. Maybe try a direct message?
misc.noadmin: I am sorry %s, but only Thorinair is allowed to use this command.

waves.title: Timestamp,Delta,Theta,Low Alpha,High Alpha,Low Beta,High Beta,Low Gamma,High Gamma,Lower Average,Upper Average

lowpass.title: Timestamp,Delta,Theta,Low Alpha,High Alpha,Low Beta,High Beta,Low Gamma,High Gamma,Lower Average,Upper Average

ema.title: Timestamp,Delta,Theta,Low Alpha,High Alpha,Low Beta,High Beta,Low Gamma,High Gamma,Lower Average,Upper Average

debug.message: > I'm sending the following message to #%s: "%s"
debug.embed: > I'm sending the following message to #%s: "%s" with image "%s" and path "%s"
debug.disconnected: I seem to have disconnected from Discord... Reconnecting.
debug.chatting: < I've received the following message from "%s": "%s", replying...
debug.welcome: New user, "%s" has joined our server! I'm promoting them to Children of The Night!
debug.welcomefail: Something bad has happened during the promotion. Here is more info: %s
debug.join: I've successfully joined Discord. My name is "%s" with ID #%s.
debug.eegerror: I am having some trouble saving the EEG data. Here is more info: %s

brain.old: A brain "%s" already seems to exit. Loading it now...
brain.new: I don't seem to have a brain "%s". I have created a new one.
brain.error: I am having some trouble saving my brain. Here is more info: %s

lyrics.old: A lyrics file already seems to exit. Loading it now...
lyrics.new: I don't seem to have a lyrics file. I have created a new one.
lyrics.done: I've finished loading my lyrics file.

artwork.old: An artwork file already seems to exit. Loading it now...
artwork.new: I don't seem to have an artwork file. I have created a new one.
artwork.done: I've finished loading my artwork file.

nptoggles.old: A Now Playing toggle file already seems to exit. Loading it now...
nptoggles.new: I don't seem to have a Now Playing toggle file. I have created a new one.
nptoggles.done: I've finished loading my Now Playing toggle file.
nptoggles.add: I am subscribing the channel #%s (%s) to automatic Now Playing announcements.
nptoggles.remove: I am unsubscribing the channel #%s (%s) from automatic Now Playing announcements.
nptoggles.autoon: Thori, I am **enabling** the automatic posting of Now Playing info.
nptoggles.autooff: Thori, I am **disabling** the automatic posting of Now Playing info.

blacklist.old: A blacklist file already seems to exit. Loading it now...
blacklist.new: I don't seem to have a blacklist file. I have created a new one.
blacklist.done: I've finished loading my blacklist file.
blacklist.add: I am adding the user #%s to the blacklist.
blacklist.remove: I am removing the user #%s from the blacklist.

ignore.old: An ignore file already seems to exit. Loading it now...
ignore.new: I don't seem to have an ignore file. I have created a new one.
ignore.done: I've finished loading my ignore file.
ignore.add: I am adding the user #%s to the ignore.
ignore.remove: I am removing the user #%s from the ignore.

seizure.old: A seizure file already seems to exit. Loading it now...
seizure.new: I don't seem to have a seizure file. I have created a new one.
seizure.done: I've finished loading my seizure file.

backup.done: I've finished backing up my data. Total size of %s bytes. Sending it now.
backup.error: Something has gone wrong. Here is more info: %s

phases.load: I'm loading all of the upcoming phase dates...
phases.done: I've finished loading the phase dates!
phases.error: I've encountered some problems loading the dates. Here is more info: "%s"

phases.filed: I've finished loading my phase backup file.
phases.no: There was no phase backup file to load. The command will not function.

varipass.error: I've encountered some problems loading the data. Here is more info: "%s"
varipass.timeout: My attempt to load the data took too long.

tradfri.connect: I'm connecting to the Tradfri hub...
tradfri.errorA: Something went wrong while connecting to the hub, retrying...
tradfri.errorB: I was unable to set the bulb, trying again...
tradfri.done: I've finished connecting to the Tradfri hub! Found bulb devices: %s
